name: electric connector production, peripheral type buss | electric connector, peripheral type buss | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9280/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of connectors used to plug external device onto a computer (e.g. USB port, serial port, parallel port, etc.). It is based on the assumption that a peripheric type connector of a computer has a typical weight of 10.0 g. The data represent a current computer peripherical type connector,  used in current information and communication technology (i.e. computers). Material data are taken from datasheets of producers of such capacitors and from the literature. Infrastructure and production efforts are based on own assumptions and taken from the Swedish LCI database and have thus, accordingly higher uncertainty.

From reception of metals and plastics at the factory gate.

This dataset includes raw material input and production efforts for the production of computer peripherical type connectors.
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represent a global valuable composition of a serial computer port.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: average connector production technology, based on literature and assumptions
